original:
対象の[Combustion]の数値1につき、ダメージ量が0.5%増加(最大15%)

[BeforeAttack] [FreischutzShotCount]が1増加
- ([FreischutzShotCount] - 1) × 5 だけ精神力が減少
- 攻撃加重値が[FreischutzShotCount]値に変更
- 精神力が10以下のとき、50%の確率で敵味方識別せずに攻撃

[EndSkill] [FreischutzShotCount]が7なら0に初期化(最後の弾丸は消耗したとみなす)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
対象の[Combustion]の数値1につき、ダメージ量が0.5%増加(最大15%)

[BeforeAttack] [FreischutzShotCount]が1増加
- ([FreischutzShotCount] - 1) × 5 だけ精神力が減少
- 攻撃加重値が[FreischutzShotCount]値に変更
- 精神力が10以下のとき、50%の確率で敵味方識別せずに攻撃

[EndSkill] [FreischutzShotCount]が7なら0に初期化(最後の弾丸は消耗したとみなす)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
대상의 [Combustion] 수치 1당 피해량 0.5% 증가 (최대 15%)

[BeforeAttack] [FreischutzShotCount] 1 증가
- ([FreischutzShotCount] - 1) x 5 만큼 정신력 감소
- 공격 가중치가 [FreischutzShotCount] 값으로 변경
- 정신력이 10 이하일 때 50% 확률로 피아식별 없이 공격

[EndSkill] [FreischutzShotCount]이 7이면 0으로 초기화 (마지막 탄환을 소모한 것으로 취급함)
EN:
Deal +0.5% damage for every [Combustion] on target (Max 15%)

[BeforeAttack] Gain 1 [FreischutzShotCount]
- Lose (([FreischutzShotCount] -1)x5) SP
- Atk Weight becomes equal to [FreischutzShotCount] value
- At 10 or less SP, 50% chance to attack indiscriminately

[EndSkill] If at 7 [FreischutzShotCount], reset to 0 (Counts as spending the last Ammo)

KR:
